caption.center: CHARLES IMBORNONE v. DEPARTMENT OF POLICE, CITY OF NEW ORLEANS.

opinion.posture: In re New Orleans Police Dept., applying for writ of certiorari and/or review; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. CA-2072; Civil Service Commission, Div. " ", No. 2229.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted in part. The declaration of unconstitutionality was unnecessary to the decision and is set aside. Otherwise, the judgment of the court of appeal is correct, and the application is denied.
